name: PortfolioDashboards.com
overview:
PortfolioDashboards, founded in 2008, was conceived and launched by a team of entrepreneurs who have many years of experience in raising angel and venture investments and operating investor-funded companies. They have experience on both sides of a deal, having both raised investments and invested in early-stage companies. They have a personal network of thousands of professional investors, ranging from seed-stage angels to later-stage venture capitalists.

There mission is to provide a platform that will drive greater efficiency in the relationship between investor and entrepreneur. This includes better visibility, consistent and standardized reporting, and an easier method to compare venture investments. The entrepreneur finds value in PortfolioDashboards as it takes less time to report on company performance and also provides a streamlined way to notify and request information and help from investors. PortfolioDashboards also uses prompts to assist the entrepreneur in understanding what the investor is interested in, such as current legal, competitive, or organizational issues.
